title: Budget 2024: FHRAI demands infrastructure status for hospitality sector from Sitharaman
description: Budget 2024: The Federation of Hotel & Restaurant Associations of India (FHRAI) unveiled a set of pre-budget expectations on Wednesday. The industry body, representing hotels, proposed a measure to confer universal infrastructure status to hotels with a project cost of Rs 10 crores and above, regardless of city population. FHRAI emphasized that this inclusive approach aligns with the spirit of equitable development, promising a nationwide surge in the hospitality sector.
